section.p:
A grey fungus as big as a football explodes without warning, scattering a cinnabar-coloured cloud of spores into the air. You breathe in a lungful of them. They later germinate, causing a bronchial disease.
Unless you have a blessing of Immunity to Disease/Poison you must
lose 1 Stamina point permanently
- i.e. reduce your unwounded Stamina score by 1.
(If you do have a blessing, remember to cross it off).
